subject: Re: Radio interview about making a "Franks Box" type device
author: psi_research
full_text:
Thanks Steve, I'll be on @ 8:15 CO mountain time and 7:15 pacific go 
to http://www.warningradio.info/ to listen to the new show.

I'm now on the darknessradio.com show archive for the show 2 weeks 
ago.

Thanks Bill

>

all

the

to

afterwards.
